com.aware
Class Network

java.lang.Object
  Service
      com.aware.Network

public class Network
extends Service

Service that logs available network status: - on/off events - Traffic throughput I/O

Author:
denzil

          AWARE Network Content Provider Allows you to access all the recorded network events on the database Database is located at the SDCard : /AWARE/network.db
